page.title: 20A.C. Bamlett Ltd.
page.content: Adam Bamlett was a notable l9th century inventor who founded the firm l25 years ago on the present site. He invented a wide range of farming machinery, and won 8O silver medals. Over the last 10 years the firm has been completely modernised. They have computer terminals in every office, and the most modern machinery on the factory floor. There is a computer which can read the plan of a shape and automatically cut that shape out of steel. The giant press has a safety device of a beam of light which when broken cuts the machine off. They sell machines for preparing land, sowing and harvesting and are the 2nd biggest supplier of corn drills in the country.They sell machines all over the world - to Russia, Central America, Africa and Saudi Arabia. {Caroline Martin
